snippet: Michael Baer joined Starcom USA, Chicago, in a new post, executive vice president and managing director, overseeing the Hallmark, Lego, Luxottica Group and Walgreens accounts.
lead_paragraph: Michael Baer joined Starcom USA, Chicago, in a new post, executive vice president and managing director, overseeing the Hallmark, Lego, Luxottica Group and Walgreens accounts.

headline.seo: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
